Key Match Events: Aaron Judge hit his first home run of the postseason.
Gleyber Torres scored on an error.
Alex Verdugo doubled to left, scoring Anthony Volpe.
Aaron Judge hit a sacrifice fly to center, scoring Anthony Rizzo.
Josh Naylor hit a sacrifice fly to right, scoring Steven Kwan.
Will Brennan grounded into a fielder's choice, scoring Kyle Manzardo.
Anthony Rizzo doubled to right, scoring Anthony Volpe.
Aaron Judge homered to center, scoring Gleyber Torres.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at Yankee Stadium with an attendance of 47,054.
The game lasted 3 hours and 26 minutes.
Umpires for the game were Gabe Morales, Chris Segal, Alan Porter, Jansen Visconti, Vic Carapazza, and Mike Estabrook.
